name: Trash Loop (RadzioGadzioPL)
description:
Hello there!

This is my 2nd game I've ever made so far and 1st that I publish. Although Ludum Dare 47 had taken place several months ago I thought of making game with "Stuck in loop" theme in 1 week. Unfortunately I didn't make it in 1 week and it took me 10 days. 

I'm not an artist, so art and sounds are poor.

If you play my game I'd like you to comment here what did you like and didn't like about it. It'll show me where I need to improve.

Hope you'll like it
